pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: Ucapan selamat tahun baru, kartu tahun baru

lessons.japanese: その祝賀会で、彼は自分の親戚に私を紹介した。
lessons.indonesian: He introduced me to his relatives at the reception.

lessons.japanese: 戦勝を祝う祝賀会が開かれた。
lessons.indonesian: Ceremonies were held to celebrate victories.
